Row.Text: [LIST][LI]The Capital being adjacent to Moutains and Lakes has increase [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION]Production.[LI]Cities adjacent to Moutains and Lakes has increase [icon:YIELD_CULTURE]Culture.[LI] Increase further for Tundra Mountains.[/LIST]

[LIST][LI]The Capital being adjacent to Moutains and Lakes has increase [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION]Production.[LI]Cities adjacent to Moutains and Lakes has increase [icon:YIELD_CULTURE]Culture.[LI] Increase further for Tundra Mountains.[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing the [B]Shwedagon Zedi Daw[/B].[/LIST]
